title: how to climb B5 the fastest?
body: i really dont know so pls help me, ive been stuck the whole time

replies.body: The best and quickest way i have found to get to b4 is to be in b2 and play solo q. Hope this helps.

Play OP champions. Done.
Or just BS ones that only work in low elo, like Warwick, Master Yi, Xin Zhao, Garen, etc.

Basically there is a lot to know, one thing most people forget that as a player you are a tool for your team and how you use that tool is up to you.

Good tools get promoted

Bad tools normally give up or cry for help

Remember that it isn't about how good you are as a player but how well you perform your role for the team
Who are you calling a tool? I'm afk. Gonna teach you a lesson.

I recommend you learn the meta; i.e. the champions that are currently recognised as strong, understand game mechanics: e.g. farming and teamfighting, as well as a thorough understanding of every champion in general. That way, when you play ranked, you are able to choose appropriately and not lose through every phase of the game. Best of luck summoner!
thanks bruv, best of luck to youu too! will be starting ranked
No such thing as summoner anymore, reported for irrelevant content on the boards :3
